name: Slashing Gems 3D
description:
Slice gems by your finger! Choose your favorite mode for maximum enjoyment!

Slashing Gems 3D is an action game where you have to slash different kinds of jewels before they fall out of your screen.

With the different kinds of gems, nice graphics with extremely attractive scenario this game will get you the best entertainment

The game offers four modes:

Classic: three missed opportunities.
Arcade: 60 seconds of game time.
Bomb: hit flying bombs.
Death: hit gems in hundreds of bombs.

Features:

Innovative, strategic and reflexive jewels cutting mechanics
Ninja style
Quality musics and graphics
Intuitive gaming experience, deep, relaxing and frantic at the same time.

Wish you have fun !
